name: Spiritmonger
text: Whenever Spiritmonger deals damage to a creature, put a +1/+1 counter on Spiritmonger.\n{B}: Regenerate Spiritmonger.\n{G}: Spiritmonger becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.

name: Call of the Herd
text: Put a 3/3 green Elephant creature token onto the battlefield.\nFlashback {3}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Chrome Mox
text: Imprint — When Chrome Mox enters the battlefield, you may exile a nonartifact, nonland card from your hand.\n{T}: Add one mana of any of the exiled card's colors to your mana pool.

name: Umezawa's Jitte
text:
Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage, put two charge counters on Umezawa's Jitte.
Remove a charge counter from Umezawa's Jitte: Choose one —
• Equipped creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
• Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
• You gain 2 life.
Equip {2}

name: Maelstrom Pulse
text: Destroy target nonland permanent and all other permanents with the same name as that permanent.
flavor: During the collision of the shards, entire ways of life disappeared without a trace.

name: Goblin Guide
text: Haste\nWhenever Goblin Guide attacks, defending player reveals the top card of his or her library. If it's a land card, that player puts it into his or her hand.
flavor: "I've been all over this world. I even remember some of those places."

name: Lotus Cobra
text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
flavor: Its scales contain the essence of thousands of lotus blooms.

name: Primeval Titan
text: Trample\nWhenever Primeval Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may search your library for up to two land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

name: All Is Dust
text: Each player sacrifices all colored permanents he or she controls.
flavor: "The emergence of the Eldrazi isn't necessarily a bad thing, as long as you've already lived a fulfilling and complete life without regrets."\n—Javad Nasrin, Ondu relic hunter

name: Batterskull
text:
Living weapon (When this Equipment enters the battlefield, put a 0/0 black Germ creature token onto the battlefield, then attach this to it.)
Equipped creature gets +4/+4 and has vigilance and lifelink.
{3}: Return Batterskull to its owner's hand.
Equip {5}

name: Griselbrand
text: Flying, lifelink\nPay 7 life: Draw seven cards.
flavor: "Avacyn emerged from the broken Helvault, but her freedom came at a price—him."\n—Thalia, Knight-Cathar
